name: Infantry Online
description:
Infantry Online is a remake of the 1999 MMO Infantry, often referred to as the world's first and only 2D isometric shooter.

Infantry Online provides a true MMO experience for players whether its defending a base with your team, attacking an enemy base to obtain the flags or aiding your squad mining minerals for supporting turrets or healing.

The game often witnesses hours upon hours of all out frenetic fun.
